meanings.definition: Mollycoddler: a person who is overprotective or indulgent towards someone
meanings.sent1: The mollycoddlers at the daycare always made sure the children were safe and happy.
meanings.sent2: Parents can sometimes be mollycoddlers when it comes to their children's well-being.
meanings.sent3: The mollycoddlers in the group always carried extra snacks for everyone.
meanings.sent4: She was the mollycoddler of the office, always checking in on her coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The mollycoddlers in the neighborhood organized a fun picnic for everyone to enjoy.

meanings.definition: Mollycoddle: to treat someone in an indulgent or overprotective way
meanings.sent1: Please don't mollycoddle him too much; he needs to learn to do things on his own.
meanings.sent2: She tends to mollycoddle her pet, always giving in to its demands.
meanings.sent3: He decided to mollycoddle himself with a day of relaxation and pampering.
meanings.sent4: The coach warned the team not to mollycoddle themselves during training.
meanings.sent5: The chef would often mollycoddle the customers with extra treats after their meal.
